授業目的: The main purpose of this course is to enable students to familiarize authentic literary texts in English. Currently many young people often enjoy English literature as a form of visual contents, such as movies and videos, but only few people read the written originals. This course will provide you with substantial opportunities to read a story written for young readers created by J. K. Rowling. Secondly, the course is providing you opportunities to consider the benefits of reading authentic materials for English learners.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to know J. K. Rowling's work written for young readers.
2. You will be able to practice sustained reading of a Rowling's story.
3. You will be able to consider the benefits of reading authentic materials for English learners.
授業方法:
- During the online period: No class on April 15; from April 22, zoom real-time sessions will be conducted at the class time until in-person class is available again. These zoom sessions will be recorded and uploaded on OneDrive. More details will be given via LUNA. You can access the LUNA contents as a "guest" from the link below.
